p: The raw MinION fast5 read data and MiSeq-derived consensus sequences are deposited at the NCBI under BioProject number PRJNA528211. Reference sequences reside in various public databases under the accession numbers listed in Table S6 ( https://figshare.com/s/b4cc885050283a40dfcd). The pipeline code is available at https://github.com/CDCgov/Mia_publication.
